title: Heart of the Swarm Database Updated
content: HotS units/buildilngs data are now better updated with the help of the Team Liquid community.

title: Introducing SC2Enhanced for Heart of the Swarm
content: We release a new SC2Enhanced app to accommodate all the new changes in the Heart of the Swarm expansion! New units, new achievements, new ladder rankings and more!

title: Cannot Load Player Data Error Resolved
content: Error for 'Cannot load player data' has been resolved. This error was caused by Blizzard's update to the StarCraft II online profile formating.
